actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 235 (Roll no. 798).
Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 235 (Roll no. 798).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

description: Amendment sought to require the Administrator of the EPA to submit a report to Congress on the long-term impacts of State coal combustion residuals permit programs on human health and the environment within five years of enactment of the legislation.
purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-244 to require the Administrator of the EPA to submit a report to Congress on the long-term impacts of State coal combustion residuals permit programs on human health and the environment within five years of enactment of the legislation.
